title: Sona in One for All

replies.body:
I remember a 5 Sona comp yesterday I was against.

5 {{champion:5}} was my team, they all died before they could get a single ult off.
:c one for all soraka is.....the best thing ever.
I WISH I WAS IN THAT! I know full AP sona is OP the only problem I have with her is her poor Wave clear and CS :(
Get a game with her and at level 6 everyone group mid for what I like to call the "March of the Sona's" So much fun.
